name: LoomInventory
description: The LoomInventory class provides functionality for interacting with loom screens in Minecraft, allowing for the addition of patterns to banners.
overview:
The LoomInventory class provides functionality for interacting with loom screens in Minecraft. Looms are used to add patterns to banners using various dye patterns and banner pattern items. This class extends the base Inventory class and adds loom-specific functionality while inheriting all standard inventory operations.

This class is automatically created when you open a loom screen and can be accessed through Player.getInventory() or Inventory.create() when a loom is open.

The loom interface consists of:
- **Banner Slot** - The banner to be modified (Slot 0)
- **Dye Slot** - The dye color to use (Slot 1)
- **Pattern Slot** - Banner pattern items that unlock special patterns (Slot 2)
- **Output Slot** - The resulting banner with applied pattern (Slot 3)
- **Pattern Selection** - Scrollable list of available patterns

constructors.description: Creates a new LoomInventory instance for the specified loom screen. Note: This constructor is primarily used internally by JSMacros; scripts typically obtain instances through Player.getInventory() or Inventory.create().

methods.name: listAvailablePatterns
methods.description: Lists the pattern IDs currently available based on the items in the loom.

methods.name: selectPatternId
methods.description: Selects a specific pattern by its resource ID (e.g., 'minecraft:stripe_bottom'). Returns true if successful.

parameters.name: patternId
parameters.description: The resource location ID of the pattern to select

methods.name: selectPatternName
methods.description: Deprecated. Throws an exception. Use selectPatternId() instead.

methods.name: getType
methods.description: Gets the inventory type information. Used to detect if the current inventory is a Loom.

methods.name: getSlot
methods.description: Gets the item stack in the specified slot. In a Loom: Slot 0 (Banner), Slot 1 (Dye), Slot 2 (Pattern), Slot 3 (Output).

methods.name: click
methods.description: Clicks on a slot in the inventory. Used to place items in the loom or take the output result.

methods.name: quick
methods.description: Performs a shift-click (quick move) on a slot.

methods.name: contains
methods.description: Checks if the inventory contains a specific item.

parameters.name: item
parameters.description: The item ID or ItemStack to search for

methods.name: getTotalSlots
methods.description: Gets the total number of slots in the inventory.
